page.title: 08DRILL EQUIPMENT MANUFACTURE
page.content:
{ Lindley Grange,}standing on a site {of 2.78 acres}is situated off the Watling Street near Nuneaton,Warwicks. It is reached by a private road off the main entrance to the Motor Industry Research Association.
It is occupied by{Hydroquest {Holdings Ltd.}who employ ten staff and twenty factory workers.Work consists of the manufacture of waterwell and down-the-hole drilling equipment, Aqualift pumps and drilling rigs.
They are{drilling consultants}and undertake training of students from this country and overseas.
